attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: To all the trump supporters, this app has hacked into my personal information. It does not work at all. The second I opened up the app it kicked me off of it. I highly do NOT recommend this app. Please download at your own risk..

attributes.title: take a gander why don’t u
attributes.review:
I support Trump and all that he stands for, but this app really destroyed my phone. It initially took a long time to download, which was fine, but now it’s taking up a very large amount of storage on my phone. I’m unsure what to do and have taken it to Apple to see if they can minimize storage consumption from this app, and they’ve just said to delete it because it’s too much consumption. It also has asked me to fill out many unusual surveys while scrolling in between articles and such, like birth date and place, current address, social security number, and other odd things. I’m sure it’s only for statistical use but it doesn’t allow me to continue scrolling until i fill it out. Lastly, this app managed to kidnap my husband and send him into hiding. He met another person through this app, and he’s not telling me who they are for my safety. He was in hiding, alone of course, in Mykonos, Greece for a short while and is now traveling again. He cannot call me due to always being on edge of intruders in his hotel rooms and suites. Though the fake pandemic is still at large, he is doing what he can to keep me safe from the effects of this horrendous app.

In summary, do not download this app, it will cause you much emotional trauma. This may even be the reason I vote Biden2020.

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review: Customer service is very bad and the overall the whole app is very laggy and it is messing up my phone.

attributes.title: Cheeto
attributes.review: The president stole my info and my money and now I sad

attributes.title: Dump trump 2020
attributes.review: WORST APP EVER OMG!!!! I was scared to get this in the first place and to see his face just made me sick!!! Do not download 🤢🤮

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE HOT GARBAGE DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: i had no clue what kind of rollercoaster ride i was in for when i downloaded this holy sheet. i downloaded the app and then i was immediately greeted by a grotesque image of mr cheeto himself with his little puff down there (iykyk).... and i felt EXTREMELY violated. then he asked me for my phone number, like excuse me no you’re ugly why tf would i give you my number you creep. then he stalked me on all of my socials for a week straight and called my landline and even my pizza hut work number. i am LIVID. he also tried to sell me some stupid yard sign and a hat or something which i said no to, then he somehow got my address and sent me catalogs to trump 2020 stuff in the mail and at that point i was done. i deleted the app and thankfully everything went back to normal, do NOT recommend, -42069365/10.

attributes.title: SECURITY BREECH HAZERD!!!!
attributes.review: This app is AWFUL. from the moment I downloaded it my phone instantly crashed

attributes.title: trump you tried,✨now never do it again✨🧚🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app made me throw up all over my cat,and then she did the same as well. It almost blew up my phone when it saw what horrible name the app had.heres a little message for Cheeto puff TRUMP 2020✨Simpson’s e d i t i o n ✨🧚‍♀️🧚 I had a bag of Cheetos in my drawer, and they left me a note saying this after they ran away,” how dare you download that yeah we’re ugly but at least why don’t look like you know who,we will not be coming back until that terrifying thing is gone.” So that just gave me another reason to delete the app,I couldn’t bare to see them go. And not only did the Cheetos leave but the Doritos did as well. If you have made to this far in the review just know that ✨g e n z w i l l r i s e✨Oh and one more thing ✨b a n c h e t t o p u f f✨😚✌️

attributes.title: this app is not helpful
attributes.review: I went to download this app and when I opened it there was a big CHEETO standing on the front of my screen. And he was trying to get me to call him a suga daddy🥺 I’m only 10yrs old
